name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant v. Leon JONES. Supreme Court of Pennsylvania

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant v. Leon JONES. Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LARSEN and McDERMOTT, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Deputy Dist. Atty., Ann C. Lebowitz, Philadelphia, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
516 A.2d 1385
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant v. Leon JONES. Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 23, 1986.
Decided Nov. 12, 1986.
Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Deputy Dist. Atty., Ann C. Lebowitz, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Andrew Jackson, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
